name: MINT JULEP

name: MINT JULEP
instruction: Put the bourbon and simple syrup in a julep tin.
Fill the tin halfway with crushed ice. Stir with a
TEASPOON,, churning the ice as you go, for about
10 seconds, holding the tin by the rim so the
entire tin can eventually frost up. Add more
crushed ice to fill the drink two-thirds full and stir
until the tin is completely frosted. Add more ice to
form a cone above the rim. Garnish with the mint
bouquet in the center of the ice and serve with a
straw.
